original_title: BREAKING: SJBs Chaminda Wijesiri Quits Parliament
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); In a surprise move, Sri Lankan opposition lawmaker Chaminda Wijesiri tendered his resignation from Parliament, effective Tuesday, January 9, 2024.
Wijesiri, delivered a statement to the Parliament, formally announcing his decision and requesting Mahinda Yapa Abeywardena to accept his letter of resignation.
